definition: to age (of person or object)/becoming old

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Elaborated in the industrialization production the steamed bun anti-aging engineering research present situation.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了工业化生产中馒头抗老化技术研究现状。

sentences.english: and an aging Challenger-class diesel submarine, the Conqueror.
sentences.chinese: 和老化的挑战者级柴油潜艇“征服者”。

sentences.english: Do you think your TV screen is wearing out ?
sentences.chinese: 你看你的电视机显象管逐渐老化了吗？

sentences.english: Germany's population is ageing, and the birth rate falling.
sentences.chinese: 德国的人口老化，出生率下降。

sentences.english: Japan web flat blanket, leak-proof, aging resistance.
sentences.chinese: 日本网平橡皮布，防漏气，耐老化。

sentences.english: Those tumors took longer to shrink but the senescent tumor cells were eventually cleared away.
sentences.chinese: 这些肿瘤缩小需较长时间但老化的细胞最终消失。

sentences.english: Deer Antler Velvet is an adaptogen and contains Growth Factors to aid the body against the aging process.
sentences.chinese: 鹿茸所包含的生长因子可以帮助身体防止老化。

sentences.english: Why is robust mouse rejuvenation the quickest route to curing human aging?
sentences.chinese: 为什么小鼠健壮返老还童是治愈人类老化的最快路线？

sentences.english: But what does science have to say about the effect of religion on the body's ageing process?
sentences.chinese: 但是宗教对人体老化的影响，科学会怎样解释呢？

sentences.english: The firm is now attempting to develop new products that can counter the effects.
sentences.chinese: 宝洁公司正致力于开发对抗皮肤老化的新产品。

sentences.english: At last, we discussed aging mechanism of two asphalts.
sentences.chinese: 并对沥青的老化机理了探讨。

sentences.english: One package of Cerasilk Aging & Wrinkle Defying Serum contains 60 capsules.
sentences.chinese: 每一盒抗皱紧肤延缓老化精华含有60片胶囊。

sentences.english: Diets rich in Omega fatty acids are instrumental in keeping your brain from aging.
sentences.chinese: 食用丰富的欧米茄脂肪酸对预防大脑老化是有帮助的。

sentences.english: If the telomeres are shortened, cells age.
sentences.chinese: 当端粒变短的时候，细胞就开始老化。

sentences.english: Gently exfoliates your entire body to remove dead cells.
sentences.chinese: 轻松容易的去除您身体的全部的老化细胞。

sentences.english: XLPE insulated pre-fabricated branch cable has good thermal stability and ageing resistance.
sentences.chinese: 型预制分支电缆具有优良的热稳定性和抗老化性。

definition: to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to age/to deteriorate with age/old and weak
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
to decline/to fall/to drop/to falter/a decline/recession (in economics)
